title: Understanding Canadian Business 8th Edition - Nickels, McHugh, M
description:
Written by Nickels, McHugh, McHugh, Cossa, Sproule 
Format(s): PDF 
Language: English 

Nickels Understanding Canadian Business 8th edition is current, comprehensive and user-friendly. This market leading text demonstrates just how integral technology is to business success. The Eighth edition is taken to a new level with the addition of adaptive learning technology (Learn Smart) and the full integration with Connect, McGraw-Hill web-based assignment and assessment technology.
